Armour.Name: Guardian's Crest
Armour.Description: A chestplate that was once worn by the legendary guardians of the realm, now yours to don.

Armour.Name: Crown of Insight
Armour.Description: An enchanted helmet that enhances the wearer's awareness and intellect.

Armour.Name: Boots of the Windwalker
Armour.Description: Light as air, these boots allow the wearer to move with unmatched speed and grace.
